title: Fishing Planet: Christmas Giant's Pack
description: With Christmas Giant’s Pack you’re getting not just any fishing tackle, but all the titanic potential for landing those Trophies and Uniques in your epic battle for the title of Christmas Giant Champion!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Christmas Giant's Pack
<!--text-->
Hey folks, it looks like this year Christmas is coming early! At least Santa Claus is already big on presents for the heavyweight league anglers! What? Now, don’t tell me you haven’t heard about this Holiday Season’s titanic fishing tournament - the Christmas Giant’s Tour! Of course you have. And for all the big league boys and girls out there who are up to enjoying this supersized challenge, Santa’s got another present: the new Christmas Giant’s Pack! This exclusive DLC features a full selection of CGT Tournament-edition tackle with enormous potential to match the size of the occasion!
Check it out! The Christmas Giant’s Pack includes a full set of CGT heavy-size monster weapons, like the super powerful MonSpin™ spinning rod with grandiose action, the heavy-league HugeCaster™ powerful casting rod, the FinGiant™ match rod for Trophy catching performance, the titanically powerful SpinTitan™ and Amplifier™ spinning reels and the big-caliber BBgun™ casting reel with exceptional muscle! Now add to that all the other limited CGT collectibles like the super tough TitanTower™ rod case and the one and only Goliath™ fishing jacket that is a stylishly genuine power statement. But it doesn’t end there! You also get countless fishing goodies including bobbers, lines, baits, jigheads, spoons, spinners and loads of other terminal tackle, equipment and licenses you could ever need to enjoy your giant fish hunt to the fullest!
With Christmas Giant’s Pack you’re getting not just any fishing tackle, but all the titanic potential for landing those Trophies and Uniques in your epic battle for the title of Christmas Giant Champion! With such godly weapons of immense power, it’s only reasonable to expect your skills to match!

Christmas Giant’s Pack include:
* 40 000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7 DAYS OF PREMIUM ACCOUNT
* 60 Storage Slots
* 3 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* CGT MonSpin™ 8' 10" (270) - Length: 8' 10" (2.7 m); Lure Weight: 3/4 – 2 1/8 Oz. (21-60 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 18 – 46 lb. (8.5-21 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 11
* CGT FinGiant™ 9' 10" (300) - Length: 9' 10" (3 m); Line Weight: 11–35 Lb. (5-16 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 3; Guides: 13
* CGT HugeCaster™ 6' 3" (190) - Length: 6' 3" (1.9 m); Lure Weight: 1–3 Oz. (28-85 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 12–50.5 Lb. (7-23 kg); Action: Slow; Pieces: 2; Guides: 7
Reels:
* CGT BBgun™ 4500 - Ratio: 6.5:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 20/110 (0.4/110), braid 30/145 (0.28/145); Max Drag: 44 Lb. (20 kg)
* CGT SpinTitan™ 4500 - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 20/110 (0.4/110), braid 30/145 (0.28/145); Max Drag: 34.2 Lb. (15.5 kg)
* CGT SpinTitan™ 5500 - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 32/110 (0.5/110), braid 30/180 (0.28/180); Max Drag: 42 Lb; (19 kg)

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines: 
Braid .011" (0.28 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 30 Lb. (13.6 kg)
Mono .02" (0.5 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 32 Lb. (14.5 kg)
Fluoro .024" (0.6 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 40 Lb. (18.1 kg)
* Bobbers: Pear Shaped Float (x2)
* Hooks: Hook #3/0, Hook #5/0, Hook #6/0, Hook #7/0, Hook #8/0, Hook #9/0, Hook #10/0
* Baits: Medium Cutbait, Large Cutbait, Large Minnows, Crawfish, Corn, Peas, Small Minnows, Spawn Sack, Shiners
* Spoons: Single Spoon 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0 (x3); Medium Spoon 2 Oz. (56 g), #6/0; Medium Spoon  1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0
* JigHeads: JigHead 1 1/16 Oz. (30 g), #6/0; JigHead 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0; JigHead 1 5/7 Oz. (48 g), #6/0; JigHead 2 Oz. (56 g), #4/0; JigHead 2 Oz. (56 g), #6/0 
* Spinners: Bullet Spinner 1 1/4 Oz (36 g), #4/0 (x4); Spinner 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #6/0
* Lures: Worm 5" (12.5 cm) (x2), Nymphes 4" (10 cm) (x2), Shad 4" (10 cm) (x2)
* Crankbaits: Crankbait 6 ft. (2 m), #5/0; Crankbait 16 ft. (5 m), #6/0; Crankbait 23 ft. (7 m), #3/0; Crankbait 30 ft. (9 m), #4/0

EQUIPMENT
* FishCastle XXL Keepnet - Max Single Fish Weight: 110 Lb. (50 kg); Total Fish Weight: 440 Lb. (200 kg); Fish-Friendly: yes
* CGT TitanTower™ Rod Case - Rods:3, Reels: 3
* CGT Goliath™ Waist Coat - Tackles: 15; Lines: 2

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
* Advanced Alberta License
* Advanced California License
* Advanced Alaska License
* Advanced Michigan License
* Advanced Florida License
